cyclone.name: LAURA
cyclone.current_location: about 525 miles SE of Lake Charles, Louisiana
cyclone.trajectory: tracking northwest toward the upper Texas and southwest Louisiana Gulf Coast

weather_observation.watch_coast: Storm-surge and hurricane watches confined to upper Texas coast to west of Morgan City, Louisiana
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane and storm-surge warnings San Luis Pass TX eastward to Intracoastal City LA; tropical-storm warning east to mouth of Mississippi River
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Primary impact expected along upper Texas and southwest Louisiana Gulf coasts; secondary impacts inland across lower Mississippi Valley
weather_observation.closest_wind_data_location: No reporting point near PortMiami in advisory wind table
weather_observation.wind: No tropical-storm-force winds anticipated at PortMiami; breezy conditions at times from peripheral gradient
weather_observation.storm_surge: None expected for the Miami area
weather_observation.rainfall: Only isolated showers; heavy rainfall threat remains west of Florida
weather_observation.other_hazards: Elevated surf and rip-current risk along south-Florida beaches from distant swells
